title: Razer upgrades Huntsman Mini keyboard with analog switches
content:
Razer is bringing its analog key switches to the Huntsman Mini – the company’s super-compact 60% gaming keyboard. The Razer Huntsman Mini Analog is the company’s latest effort to bring a different control experience to keyboard gamers. Razer had already brought its analog switches to Huntsman V2, and that version actually launched before the models

The post Razer upgrades Huntsman Mini keyboard with analog switches appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Razer has introduced a new version of the Huntsman Mini keyboard featuring analog switches, offering more precise input for PC gamers.
